artist: Artist: Paul Jacoulet; Carver: Maeda Kentarō; Printer: Honda Tetsunosuke

description: man in white robe, tall tan hat, and bare feet rests on a rock with arms resting on legs, looking to PL; straggly moustache and beard, tired eyes; rests large crate strapped to his back on rock; potted plant with blossoming flowers at LRC

markings: LRC, artist\'s good luck hammer seal; LRC, in margin: Honda Tetsunosuke suri 本多鉄之助摺, Maeda Kentarō tō 前田謙太郎刀; LRC, in margin: [MARCHAND de SEL / COREE.]; on back: red stamp LLC: [No. 266/350]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Salt Merchant, Korea
